overview: A 60 year old mother who lives alone at home and does everything herself. A few months later, the mother's son named Zainal (30 years old) and his wife Siti (28 years old) and their daughter named Anggit (10 years old) returned from overseas because the company where Zainal worked went bankrupt. Mother was happy because her son returned. However, his son Zainal doesn't care about his mother anymore. Zainal could not stand the presence of his mother in the house. Until one day Zainal called his younger sister Ana (27 years) who has been successful in the overseas. To take his mother abroad with Ana. But Ana did not want and objected if her mother lived with her.
title: Ibu
